item.title: NPM
item.description: NPM Build a project and serve it npm serve Add and Install a NPM package npm install --save <package name> NVM Install nvm Follow instructions given here Install a npm version nvm install v10.24.1 Use a npm version nvm use 15.14.0 Yarn Install project dependencies yarn install Build yarn build Serve NPM project yarn serve Serve NPM project at specific port PORT=<port number> yarn serve Axios Print request & response on browser console Add Axios debug package
